text: Somnath Chatterjee (25 July 1929 - 13 August 2018) was an Indian politician. He was a member of the Communist Party of India (Marxist) for most of his life. He was the Speaker of the Lok Sabha (House of the People) from 2004 to 2009. Chatterjee died on 13 August 2018 from a heart attack in a private hospital in Kolkata, aged 89. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Communist Party of India (Marxist) politicians Category:Speakers of the Lok Sabha Category:Politicians from Kolkata
title: Somnath Chatterjee
